name: Iron Cobra
immunities: poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t adamantine
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can’t speak

traits.name: Find Target
traits.desc: The iron cobra knows the location of a specific target creature as long as that creature is within 1 mile of it. If the creature is moving, it knows the direction if that creature’s movement. If the target is beyond this distance, the iron cobra can’t locate the target creature.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.desc: The iron cobra is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The iron cobra has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapon
traits.desc: The iron cobra’s weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Poison
traits.desc: The iron cobra contains enough venom for three attacks. After that, it does not deal the poison damage listed in its bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.
